com.twitter.sdk.android.core.identity

Class TwitterAuthClient

  • Object
    • com.twitter.sdk.android.core.identity.TwitterAuthClient

  • public class TwitterAuthClient
extends Object
    Client for requesting authorization and email from the user.

    • Method Detail

      • getRequestCode

        public int getRequestCode()

      • authorize

        public void authorize(Activity activity,
             Callback<TwitterSession> callback)
        Requests authorization.
        Parameters:
        activity - The Activity context to use for the authorization flow.
        callback - The callback interface to invoke when authorization completes.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if activity or callback is null.

      • onActivityResult

        public void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                    int resultCode,
                    Intent data)
        Call this method when Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) is called to complete the authorization flow.
        Parameters:
        requestCode - the request code used for SSO
        resultCode - the result code returned by the SSO activity
        data - the result data returned by the SSO activity

      • requestEmail

        public void requestEmail(TwitterSession session,
                Callback<String> callback)
        Requests the user's email address.
        Parameters:
        session - the user session
        callback - The callback interface to invoke when the request completes. If the user denies access to the email address, or the email address is not available, an error is returned.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if session or callback are null.

      • getScribeClient

        protected DefaultScribeClient getScribeClient()
